name: Dangerous Land
description:
Play as the lord of your own medieval settlement, manage and develop it in real time from a first-person perspective.

Switch between 4 modes (Free, Build, Lord and Fight) to fully control everything around.

Protect the Town Hall, which is the center of your village, and prevent the enemy from destroying it.

Collect and manage resources





  • Extract 5 types of raw materials.
  • Receive gold chests for developing the settlement.
  • Produce arrows in the archery workshop.

Take care of food - each unit eats a certain amount of berries from time to time, which you can get only from berry bushes located in different places on the map. One of the "Berry Farm" buildings can help you with this, to which you can transport a previously dug berry bush.

Develop your settlement





Switch to Build mode to place and build new buildings - At the moment there are available 8 + 1 (Town Hall, with which you start each mission).

Buildings can be placed at a limited distance from each other, so to occupy further areas, you will need to place buildings further from the center of your settlement. Plan the placement of your buildings to increase their efficiency and usability.

Manage the settlement from the management panel





Select a specific building in Lord or Build mode to expand its panel, or enter Free mode and control buildings wherever you are. You also have some other information in the panel.

Recruit and manage units





Recruit units and give them commands - There are currently 4 combat units available + worker unit.

Switch to Lord mode to mark units like in classic RTS games:

  • Mark the field on the screen and select the units that are within the set distance from the player.
  • Click and select a single unit - Hold Ctrl to select and deselect any units.
  • Double-click on a unit and select all units of its type near the selected one.

Join skirmishes as a soldier





Fight alongside your troops, attack enemy structures or repel their attacks. Switch to Fight mode to use your sword and shield or bow. As you fight, earn experience points and improve your skills.

Create upgrades and research new things





Upgrade buildings, create upgrades for yourself and your units. Create research to unlock new things.
